text: Nurse Betty is a 2000 American black comedy movie. This movie is about a Kansas waitress who has a nervous breakdown after she sees her husband being murdered. Ren√©e Zellweger plays Betty Sizemore. Chris Rock plays Wesley. Morgan Freeman plays Charlie. The movie won Best Screenplay at the Cannes Film Festival in 2000. The movie was rated R "for strong violence, pervasive language and a scene of sexuality". Nurse Betty got very positive reviews from critics. Roger Ebert gave it three stars. Metacritic rated gave it a Metascore of 69. It was released on September 8, 2000. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:2000 comedy-drama movies Category:2000s black comedy movies Category:2000 crime drama movies Category:2000s criminal comedy movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:German drama movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Movies directed by Neil LaBute Category:American independent movies
title: Nurse Betty
